message: Bob, I'm excited to offer you a chance to own this truly unique product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,500,000.

Hello Alice, I appreciate the opportunity to purchase your unique product. However, given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the initial asking price of $1,500,000. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,200,000.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer.  While that price doesn't quite reflect the true value of this product, I'm willing to come down to $1,350,000. This is a very rare opportunity to own something this unique.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I must stick to my budget. I would like to counter with an offer of $1,300,000.
